schema:name: Condition of geological and geomorphological heritage features of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in England, 2019 to 2021

schema:creator.schema:name: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

schema:isBasedOn.schema:name: Condition of geological and geomorphological heritage features of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in England

notes:
Based on the condition of 1,526 geological and geomorphological heritage features that had been assessed by December 2021, with 30% of those assessments being carried out since 2015 and 60% being carried out since 2011. A further 9% of all 1,679 features are still to be assessed. As of December 2019, 1,326 geological and geomorphological heritage features had been assessed.
    
</br>This indicator is updated biennially; the next scheduled update, using 2023 data, will take place in 2024.

columns.name: year
columns.schema:description: The year range for the data present

datatype.format: Favourable|Unfavourable - Recovering|Unfavourable - No change|Unfavourable - Declining|Partially destroyed|Destroyed|Unassessed

columns.name: percentage
columns.schema:description: The percentage of sites in the corresponding condition
